creator: Trippers.app
descriptionHtml:
Plan Your Next Weekend Getaway with Trippers, The Essential All-in-One Travel Planner. Because Time is Your Most Precious Commodity. Less Planning, More Experiencing. Everything You Need to Plan Your Next Trip Combined in One Platform. We do the Heavy Lifting so You Focus on Truly Experiencing Your Trip!

Travel Alone. With Family. With Friends. With Trippers.


_____ HOW TO PLAN A TRIP WITH TRIPPERS? _____

1. INVITE YOUR FRIENDS TO JOIN
One-click sharing. One-click joining.

2. TELL US YOUR AVAILABILITY
With saturated schedules, finding the right travel dates for a group can be tough. Give us your availabilities, we'll find the best dates for everyone. You vote. Done.

3. TELL US YOUR PREFERENCES
Group travel is full of compromises. And that won’t change. But we can make sure you all get what you want right from the beginning, in choosing the destination. Tell us your budget and whether you’re a foodie, a party animal, or a history buff, we’ll match you to the perfect city and find you perfect flights, even if you live in different cities.

4. VOTE AND BOOK
Vote to choose your favourite destination and book in just one click.

5. PICK YOUR FAVOURITE ACTIVITIES
Because we all have different expectations when travelling, give us your preferences, pick what you’d like to do, and we’ll plan for you. Making everyone happy isn’t an easy task, and nor is optimizing travel itineraries and logistics, so we’ll need a little something from you here:

Trippers Itinerary Maker -
*Solo Travel – 9.99€
*Group Travel – 14.99€ pp

6. TAKE US WITH YOU
Take off feeling confident that we’ve got you covered. We know travelling as a group means you sometimes need to go with the flow, and we’re all for it. No static plans, we come with you for all the last-minute changes. As many times as you need.


_____ WHY PLAN A TRIP WITH TRIPPERS? _____

Trippers saves you time, more than 30 hours! And the more you travel with us, the more time you save as we’ll make sure you never forget what you like!

• Sick of the endless group threads leading nowhere?
• Ever spent a week just trying to figure out everyone’s availabilities?
• And two more discussing destinations, between the places John has already been to, the place that’s too cold for Linda, and the one for which flights from London are too expensive?
• Ever turned up to the other side of town to realise the place you came for was closed on Tuesdays?
• Or skipped the nap to search for a dinner place?
• Maybe you just wish planning your itinerary could be easier. No more juggling between 10+ websites and apps to find your top 10 places to visit, hours spent figuring out which to visit first and save everything on a good old Google Sheet.


_____ WHAT ELSE DOES IT DO? _____

# FIND INSPIRATION
As the go-to platform for travel planning, Trippers hand selects the best content for you. Browse through our 200+ articles carefully curated by ourselves and our blogger partners to get the best advice before you go.

# SAVE PLACES FOR LATER
Ever read about what sounded like THE best experience ever, took a screenshot and then forgot about it when the time came to plan a trip to that destination? We’ve been there, so we’ve done something about it. Find something you want to save for later in the blogs? Open its detailed description and save it with a simple click. We’ll make sure to include it in your activity list next time you’re planning a trip there.

# KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TRAVEL
Pin all the places you’ve been to, plan new trips with Trippers, grow your profile, and share your experience for a chance to be featured as our Top Trippers of the Month.


_____ IN THE PRESS _____

Outlook Travel Magazine
Startup Tracker – Hottest New Startups of 2021


_____ SAY HELLO _____

Instagram – @trippers.app
Twitter – @trippers_app
Facebook – @travelwithtrippers
Pinterest – @trippers_app

Download now!

www.trippers.app


©2021 Trippers SARL

descriptionHtml:
Plan Your Next Weekend Getaway with Trippers, The Essential All-in-One Travel Planner. Because Time is Your Most Precious Commodity. Less Planning, More Experiencing. Everything You Need to Plan Your Next Trip Combined in One Platform. We do the Heavy Lifting so You Focus on Truly Experiencing Your Trip!

Travel Alone. With Family. With Friends. With Trippers.


_____ HOW TO PLAN A TRIP WITH TRIPPERS? _____

1. INVITE YOUR FRIENDS TO JOIN
One-click sharing. One-click joining.

2. TELL US YOUR AVAILABILITY
With saturated schedules, finding the right travel dates for a group can be tough. Give us your availabilities, we'll find the best dates for everyone. You vote. Done.

3. TELL US YOUR PREFERENCES
Group travel is full of compromises. And that won’t change. But we can make sure you all get what you want right from the beginning, in choosing the destination. Tell us your budget and whether you’re a foodie, a party animal, or a history buff, we’ll match you to the perfect city and find you perfect flights, even if you live in different cities.

4. VOTE AND BOOK
Vote to choose your favourite destination and book in just one click.

5. PICK YOUR FAVOURITE ACTIVITIES
Because we all have different expectations when travelling, give us your preferences, pick what you’d like to do, and we’ll plan for you. Making everyone happy isn’t an easy task, and nor is optimizing travel itineraries and logistics, so we’ll need a little something from you here:

Trippers Itinerary Maker -
*Solo Travel – 9.99€
*Group Travel – 14.99€ pp

6. TAKE US WITH YOU
Take off feeling confident that we’ve got you covered. We know travelling as a group means you sometimes need to go with the flow, and we’re all for it. No static plans, we come with you for all the last-minute changes. As many times as you need.


_____ WHY PLAN A TRIP WITH TRIPPERS? _____

Trippers saves you time, more than 30 hours! And the more you travel with us, the more time you save as we’ll make sure you never forget what you like!

• Sick of the endless group threads leading nowhere?
• Ever spent a week just trying to figure out everyone’s availabilities?
• And two more discussing destinations, between the places John has already been to, the place that’s too cold for Linda, and the one for which flights from London are too expensive?
• Ever turned up to the other side of town to realise the place you came for was closed on Tuesdays?
• Or skipped the nap to search for a dinner place?
• Maybe you just wish planning your itinerary could be easier. No more juggling between 10+ websites and apps to find your top 10 places to visit, hours spent figuring out which to visit first and save everything on a good old Google Sheet.


_____ WHAT ELSE DOES IT DO? _____

# FIND INSPIRATION
As the go-to platform for travel planning, Trippers hand selects the best content for you. Browse through our 200+ articles carefully curated by ourselves and our blogger partners to get the best advice before you go.

# SAVE PLACES FOR LATER
Ever read about what sounded like THE best experience ever, took a screenshot and then forgot about it when the time came to plan a trip to that destination? We’ve been there, so we’ve done something about it. Find something you want to save for later in the blogs? Open its detailed description and save it with a simple click. We’ll make sure to include it in your activity list next time you’re planning a trip there.

# KEEP TRACK OF YOUR TRAVEL
Pin all the places you’ve been to, plan new trips with Trippers, grow your profile, and share your experience for a chance to be featured as our Top Trippers of the Month.


_____ IN THE PRESS _____

Outlook Travel Magazine
Startup Tracker – Hottest New Startups of 2021


_____ SAY HELLO _____

Instagram – @trippers.app
Twitter – @trippers_app
Facebook – @travelwithtrippers
Pinterest – @trippers_app

Download now!

www.trippers.app
